channel.title: Draygntiy l 06-07 Remake l #1 Server l Great community l Simply the best! l
channel.description:
[url=http://draygntiy.allalla.com/Play.html] Home [/url]
Brief Introduction:
Our primary goal for Draygntiy is to ensure that the game-play for Draygntiy resembles accurately as possible to RuneScape's 06/07 gameplay. At this point we're currently in a beta stage therefore you may experience some bugs or even flaws, but bare with us we're working on fixing them as we speak!
Combat:
- Perfect maxhit formulas! - Most weapons working! - Ice barrage working! - Poisoning (Anti-poisons work too) - Msb Special attack working!
Server:
- Dedicated owner & staff [Currently looking for moderators] - Weekly updates - Fully DDos Protection - Protected Site - Friendly players - Active community - Active Pvming/Skilling! - Working sounds! Other Features:
- Friends List working completely (on, off, private) - Perfect working shops! - All skills working 100% - 9 quests! - No Lagging - 24/7 Hosted with vps - Clue scrolls - Mac/Windows compatible - Barrows - PvP! - And alot ALOT more! - Jad with all the waves! [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ymeihd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/i6ftxt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2cr2914.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2e3bpmh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/23ljg3d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/sb6d1e.png[/img] More pics will be added soon.
Credit: 98% r0cky 0wnz 2% Owner Saulito

item.description:
@Richard_V2 wrote:

Home

Brief Introduction:

Our primary goal for Draygntiy is to ensure that the game-play for Draygntiy resembles accurately as possible to RuneScape’s 06/07 gameplay.
At this point we’re currently in a beta stage therefore you may experience some bugs or even flaws,
but bare with us we’re working on fixing them as we speak!

Combat:

  • Perfect maxhit formulas!
  • Most weapons working!
  • Ice barrage working!
  • Poisoning (Anti-poisons work too)
  • Msb Special attack working!

Server:

  • Dedicated owner & staff [Currently looking for moderators]

  • Weekly updates

  • Fully DDos Protection

  • Protected Site

  • Friendly players

  • Active community

  • Active Pvming/Skilling!

  • Working sounds!
    Other Features:

  • Friends List working completely (on, off, private)

  • Perfect working shops!

  • All skills working 100%

  • 9 quests!

  • No Lagging

  • 24/7 Hosted with vps

  • Clue scrolls

  • Mac/Windows compatible

  • Barrows

  • PvP!

  • And alot ALOT more!

  • Jad with all the waves!
